entry.title: 100 PCS | 8" Biodegradable Sugarcane Straws, Natural Plant Based Compostable Eco-friendly Drinking Straws
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5460
Type: Disposables
Price: 4.99

[About]

Quantity: 100 Drinking Straws
Material: Sugarcane Bagasse
Color: Natural
Straw Length: 7.75"
Straw Diameter: 0.25"
Features: Organic, Plant Based, Non Toxic, Durable & Reusable
Can be reused several times if properly cleaned and stored
Works with both hot and cold drinks
Natural coloring, does not change the taste of your drink
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

      [Information]


      Additional Information:

      • Though they are intended to be a one-time use product, they can be reused several times if properly cleaned and stored.
      • Both straw ends are flat
      • In HOT Liquid, straws will be softer and bendable due to heat but will reform back to shape once it's back to normal temperature
      • Sugarcane Straws vs Paper Straws:
        • Sugarcane Straws will not become soggy like paper straws and will not impart any paper taste or flavor.
        • Sugarcane Straws do not have any coatings and no dyes are used — which are common characteristics in paper straws.
      • Sugarcane Straws vs Plastic Straws:
        • Sugarcane Straws are generally more rigid than plastic straws due to the incorporation of sugar cane fibers.
        • Sugar cane fiber straws are 100% compostable and made with 100% plant-based ingredients from renewable resources.
      • Storage: Should be stored in a cool and dry environment away from sunlight. Heat and humidity could affect its durability and performance.
      • Note: They should only be used for drinking and are not intended to be eaten or digested.
      • Uses: Wedding, Party, Birthday, Event, Picnic, Outdoor Party, Craft

entry.title: 10 Pack | 13" Gold Cardboard Charger Plates, Disposable Round Serving Tray with Scalloped Rims - 1100 GSM

Color: Gold
Shape: Round
Style: Scalloped Charger
Total Size: 12.75" Diameter
Thickness: 1mm
Depth: 0.25"
Features: High quality food-grade paper material, Odorless, Thick, and Durable disposable
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

1100 GSM Gold Charger Plates

Flaunting a sparkling appearance and chic scalloped edges, our upscale charger plates are great for enhancing food presentation at your catered events, culinary functions, outdoor reception, weddings, banquets, and even festive holiday dining. Artistically handcrafted from robust high grade 1100 GSM paper, this charger plate is strong enough to withstand possible wear and tear, thus giving you an elegant service plate or under plate to dress up your dining tables.

Round Serving Tray

Stylish scalloped rims coupled with glistening metallic finish together will impart a regal accent to your table settings. With its 12.75" diameter, this charger plate can easily be paired with a 10" dinner plate and 7" salad plate to create a table with a mix of patterns and finishes that will surely impress your guests.

Multipurpose & Versatile

Highly impressive in appearance and equally versatile in application, this multipurpose charger plate can be used for serving soups, salads, and entrees. Plus it will efficiently help in preventing spills and messes by catching any excess food and will protect your plush tablecloths and covers.

 

Additional Information:

  • Inner Diameter I: 11"
  • Inner Diameter II: 10"
  • Inner Diameter III: 7.75"
  • Color and Design is on Top Side ONLY
  • Bottom Side is all White
  • All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Uses: Perfect for wedding receptions, banquets, and upscale catered events

WARNING: Not Microwave or Dishwasher Safe

All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Rectangular Cardboard Tray

Serve with style and sophistication using our classy disposable paper trays that offer the convenience of disposability with the charm of high grade cardboard construction. Featuring sparkling metallic finish in modish rectangular shape and luxe leather texture design, these trendy trays will take your food presentation to the next level of opulence.

Premium Quality

Transform your conventional dining experience into an elegant affair with these classy serving trays fashioned in contemporary design and chic rectangle shape. Baroque design on borders will add an elite touch to your tablescape. Crafted from heavy duty 1100 GSM cardboard, these sturdy trays help you serve your favorite dishes without spilling or leaking.

Multipurpose

Highly attractive in appearance and equally versatile in application, these multipurpose trays feature best grade odorless cardboard construction that will bring out the true aroma of your scrumptious delights. Perfect to serve you appetizers, desserts, salads, and main course, these trays can be used to flaunt floral or candle arrangements, tabletop décor and centerpieces. For gorgeous cohesive table settings, pair these posh platters with our metallic charger plates, vases, candle stands, and centerpieces.

 

Additional Information:

  • Rim Thickness: 1mm
  • All sizes are approximate measurements

Note:

  • Color and Design is on Top Side ONLY
  • Bottom Side is all White

WARNING: Not Microwave or Dishwasher Safe

Perfect for wedding receptions, banquets, and upscale catered events
